Tips On The Dangers Of Poor Sewage Disposal

Sewage that end up in water bodies negatively change the chemical composition of the water. This will affect the ecosystem existing in the water.it causes harm to animals and humans that drink from such polluted water.
Sewage can harm plant when they take up the contamination through their roots. The plants in turn have negative impact on humans that consume them.
Poor and Primitive sewerage disposal can result to land and air pollution and can cause respiratory problems as contaminants are absorbed from the lungs into other part of the body.
Every one want to live and visit places that are clean,fresh and healthy.An area with poor sanitation, do not attract people, investors and tourists. And the standard of living tends to be low.
An area that do not invest in recycling and proper sewage management miss out on job opportunities that comes from recycling, composting and business that work with them .
Sewerage is developed with a deep passion of putting an end to the menace of improper sewage disposal particularly in Calabar Municipal of Cross River State and Nigeria in general.
